page.title: 13Mr Philips The Garage Owner
page.content: Mr Philips has owned the garage for sixteen months, before that he lived in Lea for seventeen years and earlier Bardney for eleven years. He has worked in a garage for twenty-three years and prior to this as a policeman. This is a family business, which has a lot of customers every day and therefore, Mr Philips does not want to change his business in any way. His working day he describes has hectic. Some days it is all paper work from morning to night and other days, he works in the garage doing repairs and Minstry of Transport tests. He has not much time for leisure as he works thirteen hour a day, seven days a week. He employs six people two of which are his sons.
